text: "She's Just Killing Me" is a 1996 song by ZZ Top and is the leading single from their 12th studio album Rhythmeen. It was taken from the 1996 movie From Dusk Till Dawn and was featured on the soundtrack. ==Track listing== #"She's Just Killing Me" #"Dengue Woman Blues" (written and performed by Jimmie Vaughan) ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:ZZ Top songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: She's Just Killing Me
